name: Manga Browser Comic File
summary: Learn about .SVA files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: SVA files may also be viewed with the Manga Browser application, which is available for some mobile phone platforms, including Android.
Shonen Jump is a popular manga magazine that has been published in many different editions since 1969. VIZ Media now distributes some editions online.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
